short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the deletion of posts from the YouTube Community tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate the management of your YouTube Community tab with ease! This Chrome extension enables content creators to save time by bulk deleting posts from the Community tab. Perfect for channels looking to clean up their community content or refresh their public-facing posts.

Features:
Automatically delete posts in bulk from the YouTube Community tab.
Countdown timer and total post deletion counter for transparency.
Simple Start/Stop functionality for ease of use.
Auto-scroll to load additional posts during bulk deletion.
This tool is built to optimize your workflow, helping you maintain a clean and professional YouTube Community tab without hassle.

Why Install This Extension?
Save Time: Bulk actions mean no need for manual deletions.
Easy to Use: User-friendly interface for quick setup and control.
Customizable: Start, stop, and monitor progress easily.
